assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Dr. George E. Peoples receives consulting fees from Emtora Biosciences, the producers of eRapa. Emtora Biosciences is also the funding sponsor for a phase II study of eRapa in patients with familial adenomatous polyposis. The remaining authors have no conflicts of interest to disclose.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This manuscript is a review article and does not involve any new data, patients, or trials that have not been previously published. No formal ethics review or approval was required to produce this manuscript.

assertion.label: Free to read
assertion.name: free
assertion.value: This content has been made available to all.

title: Chemoprevention in familial adenomatous polyposis: past, present and future
